tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
	user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	enabled_notifications BOOL,
	night_mode BOOL,
	home_temperature INT,
	preferred_light_color STRING
);

CREATE TABLE smart_devices (
  device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id),
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  device_name VARCHAR(100),
  status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE user_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id),
    device_type VARCHAR(255),
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    device_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
    activity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES user_preferences(user_id),
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_duration INT,
    activity_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs ( 
 log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 user_id UUID REFERENCES UserPreferences(user_id), 
 device_id UUID REFERENCES DeviceStatus(device_id), 
 log_data JSONB, 
 timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ 
 );
